main.name: Mohammad Saleh Refahi
main.description: I am a machine learning developer at the fraud management group of the ISC company. I cooperate to develop fraud detection applications in a large number of transactions. Besides, I am studying to improve my biology knowledge by reading
main.description1: and taking the "Network Analysis in Systems Biology " course in the coursera.
main.bio: My enthusiasm for studying and researching the human genome and human disease is beyond the belief.

work.title: Machine Learning Researcher And Software Developer
work.description: Contributed in design fraud detection systems, including data, pre-processing, optimization,post-processing, and interfaces for user interaction. Determined and developed algorithms to improve and optimize operational processes.

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Advised on design, planning and implementation of OCR projects. Create an OCR program to detect number on Water metering in python and also on ARM micro controllers.

work.company: Iranian Research Institute For Information Science (IRANDOC)
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Extracting discriminated features from integration of evolutionary feature extraction methods from protein sequences and using the SVM to evaluate our method on benchmark datasets.
